body:
Ruby Docs:
http://www.ruby-doc.org
http://api.rubyonrails.org

Ruby Gems:
https://www.ruby-toolbox.com/categories/by_name
http://rubygems.org/gems/rails

Text Editors:
http://gopollgo.com/what-is-your-primary-text-editor-for-ruby-slash-rails

Ruby Docs:
http://www.ruby-lang.org/en/
http://tryruby.org/levels/1/challenges/0
http://rubymonk.com
http://rubykoans.com
http://ruby.learncodethehardway.org/

Rails:
http://guides.rubyonrails.org/getting_started.html
http://railscasts.com
http://ruby.railstutorial.org
http://rubyonrails.org/screencasts/rails3
http://net.tutsplus.com
https://peepcode.com

Books:
http://www.amazon.com/Foundation-Rails-2-Eldon-Alameda/dp/1430210397/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&qid=1348926494&sr=8-3&keywords=eldon+rails
http://www.amazon.com/The-Ruby-Way-Second-Edition/dp/0672328844
http://pragprog.com/book/ruby3/programming-ruby-1-9	
http://pragprog.com

Git:
https://github.com
http://git-scm.com
http://gitimmersion.com

Style Guides:
https://github.com/styleguide/ruby
https://github.com/bbatsov/rails-style-guide

Keep Up:
http://www.rubyinside.com
http://rubyweekly.com/
https://twitter.com/ruby_news
http://www.rubyflow.com/

http://stackoverflow.com/

What Else:
http://www.heroku.com
http://haml.info
http://coffeescript.org
http://sass-lang.com


“Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.” 
― Benjamin Franklin
